name: PAT_ENC_MSP_WC
description: This table contains the Worker's Compensation Info part of the Medicare Secondary Payor Information from the Patient (EPT) master file.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date (calendar format) on which the encounter took place.

columns.name: WORKERS_COMP_YN
columns.description: YES if the illness or injury is covered by a workers' compensation claim.

columns.name: WC_ACCDNT_DATE
columns.description: Injury date of the work related accident.

columns.name: WC_POLICY_NUMBER
columns.description: Policy number of the workers' compensation coverage for the accident.

columns.name: WC_EMPLR_NAME
columns.description: If the accident occurred at work, enter the place of employment.

columns.name: WC_EMPLR_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of worker's compensations' employer's street address.

columns.name: WC_EMPLR_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of worker's compensations' employer's street address.

columns.name: WC_PLAN_ADR_1
columns.description: Line 1 of the street address for the  worker's compensation plan.

columns.name: WC_PLAN_ADR_2
columns.description: Line 2 of the street address for the  worker's compensation plan.
